name: DeepDark Qwant - No more updated (hackers only)
description:
Give a dark and clean appearance to the Qwant search engine and its derivatives Qwant Lite and Qwant Junior. Also works with the Qwant blog. Fits perfectly with the overall style Deep Dark. Please return suggestions or bugs...
Donne une apparence sombre et minimaliste au moteur de recherche européen Qwant, et ses dérivées Lite et Junior. Fonctionne aussi avec le blog Qwant. Convient parfaitement avec le thème complet Deep Dark. SVP transmettez-moi les suggestions ou bugs.
additional_info:
No more maintened!
ver 0.2.2
    Fixed some QwantMusic problems and added the movies display. Please contact me if other problems.

ver 0.2.1
    Fixed few problems on main Qwant, QwantJunior, blog Qwant.

ver 0.2.1
    Fixed the music page non-working theme

ver. 0.2
    Fixed some problems about the weather display (too light)
    Qwant Blog style created

ver. 0.1
    Normal Qwant search engine tested during 1 year
    Qwant Lite and Qwant Junior dark aspect created
